title: Ultrasound provides precise, minimally invasive way to measure heart function in children

title_detail.value: Ultrasound provides precise, minimally invasive way to measure heart function in children

summary: Currently, a practical, precise, minimally invasive way to measure cardiac output or heart function in children undergoing surgery does not exist. New research illustrates how a novel minimally invasive method using catheter-based ultrasound to measure heart function performed with similar precision to a traditional highly invasive device.
